SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Order Product Fields

The Order Product object represents an original product on an order. It can also represent a charge, such as a delivery charge. With an order product summary change, it can represent a change to a product on an order, such as a return or cancellation. In Order Management, you usually interact with order product summaries instead of order products.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Order Product object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Adjusted Product Subtotal	The order product amount, including adjustments, but not tax.
Adjusted Product Subtotal Tax	The tax on the adjusted product subtotal.
Adjusted Product Subtotal with Tax	

The order product amount, including adjustments and tax.

Adjusted Product Subtotal with Tax = Adjusted Product Subtotal + Adjusted Product Subtotal Tax


Available Quantity	The amount of an order product that is available to be reduced. An order product is reducible only if the available quantity is greater than zero (0).
Created By	The user who created the order product record.
Created Date	The date when the order product record was created.
Distributed Order Adjustments	

The total amount, not including tax, of order-level price adjustments applied to the order product.

Applies only to order products of type Order Product.
Used only when the Order Adjustment Group has a type value of Header.

Distributed Order Adjustments Tax	The tax on distributed order adjustments.
Distributed Order Adjustments with Tax	

The total amount, including taxes, of order-level price adjustments applied to the order product.

Distributed Order Adjustments with Tax = Distributed Order Adjustments + Distributed Order Adjustments Tax


End Date	The last day that the order product is available.
Gross Unit Price	The unit price of the order product, including tax. This field is populated only when using a tax locale type of Gross.
Last Modified By	The user who last changed the order product record.
Last Modified Date	The date when the order product record was last changed.
Line Description	The description of the order product. During checkout this field is populated with the order product name.
Line Number	The numerical value used to order lines on the order.
List Price	The list price for the order product. This value is inherited from the associated Price Book Entry when the order is created.
Order	The order that contains the order product.
Order Delivery Group	The order delivery group for the order product.
Order Product Number	The auto-generated number used to identify the order product.
Original Order Product	The original order product that a reduction order is reducing.
Product	The name of the order product
Product Adjustments	The total amount, not including tax, of the product-level price adjustments on the order product.
Product Adjustments Tax	The tax on product adjustments.
Product Adjustments with Tax	

The total amount, including tax, of the product-level price adjustments on the order product.

Product Adjustments with Tax = Product Adjustments + Product Adjustments Tax


Product Subtotal	

The price of the product, not including tax or adjustments.

Product Subtotal = Unity Price x Quantity


Product Subtotal Tax	The tax on the product subtotal.
Product Subtotal (Rounded)	The rounded product subtotal amount, before tax and adjustments. For currencies with decimal values of 0.5 and higher, this amount is rounded up to the next highest whole unit of currency.
Product Subtotal (Rounded) with Tax	The rounded product subtotal amount, including tax. For currencies with decimal values of 0.5 and higher, this amount is rounded up to the next highest whole unit of currency.
Quantity	The number of units ordered.
Related Order Product	For change orders, this field shows the original order product.
Start Date	The start date of availability for the order product.
Total Adjustments	The total amount, not including taxes, of all price adjustments on the order product.
Total Adjustments Tax	The tax on total adjustments.
Total Adjustments with Tax	

The total amount, including taxes, of all price adjustments on the order product.

Total Adjustments with Tax = Total Adjustments + Total Adjustments Tax


Total Amount with Tax	

The total amount, including tax and price adjustments, of the order product.

Total Amount with Tax = Total Price + Total Tax


Total Price	

The total price of the order product, including tax, but not adjustments.

Total Price = Product Subtotal + Product Subtotal Tax


Total Tax	The total tax for the order product, including adjustments.
Type	

The type of the order product. Each type corresponds to one type code.

Possible values and corresponding type codes (in parentheses) are:

Delivery Charge (Charge)—Indicates that the order product represents a delivery charge.
Order Product (Product)—Indicates that the order product represents any other type of product, service, or charge.

Type Code	

The type code of the order product.

The type code of the order product.

Possible values are:

Charge—Indicates that the order product represents a delivery charge.
Product—Indicates that the order product represents any other type of product, service, or charge.

Unit Price	The unit price of the order product.

title: Understanding Order Product Object
